components.mentoring.automation.automati:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the automation introduction section
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Automation (introduction section header)
**When Users See This**: When navigating to the Automation feature introduction
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Initiate feedback automation…Beep boop bop…"

**Functional Purpose**: Explanatory text describing the Automation feature
**UI Location**: Mentoring → Automation (introduction section paragraph)
**When Users See This**: When first introduced to the Automation feature
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Automation is a space that allows you to see common solutions to exercises and write feedback once for all students with that particular solution."
